mapper.select: SELECT CO_CD, DIV_CD, DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, DEPT_ZIP, DEPT_ADDR, DEPT_ADDR1 FROM DEPT WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd};
SELECT CO_CD, DIV_CD, DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, DEPT_ZIP, DEPT_ADDR, DEPT_ADDR1 FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_CD = #{deptCd};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPT (CO_CD, DIV_CD, DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, DEPT_ZIP, DEPT_ADDR, DEPT_ADDR1, INSERT_ID) VALUES (#{coCd}, #{divCd}, #{deptCd}, #{deptNm}, #{deptZip},#{deptAddr}, #{deptAddr1}, #{insertId});
mapper.update: UPDATE DEPT SET DEPT_NM = #{deptNm}, DEPT_ZIP = #{deptZip}, DEPT_ADDR = #{deptAddr}, DEPT_ADDR1 = #{deptAddr1} WHERE DEPT_CD=#{deptCd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DIVS LEFT JOIN DEPT ON DIVS.CO_CD = DEPT.CO_CD AND DIVS.DIV_CD = DEPT.DIV_CD WHERE DIVS.CO_CD = #{coCd} ORDER BY INSERT_DT ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT DIVS.co_cd, DIVS.div_cd FROM DIVS LEFT JOIN DEPT ON DIVS.CO_CD = DEPT.CO_CD AND DIVS.DIV_CD = DEPT.DIV_CD WHERE DIVS.CO_CD = #{coCd};
SELECT DISTINCT DIVS.div_cd, dept.DEPT_CD FROM DEPT LEFT JOIN DIVS ON DIVS.CO_CD = DEPT.CO_CD AND DIVS.DIV_CD = DEPT.DIV_CD WHERE DIVS.div_CD = #{divCd};

SELECT DIVS.CO_CD, DIVS.DIV_CD, DIVS.DIV_NM, DEPT.DEPT_NM, DEPT.DEPT_CD,DEPT.DEPT_ZIP,DEPT.DEPT_ADDR,DEPT.DEPT_ADDR1,DEPT.INSERT_DT FROM DEPT JOIN DIVS ON DIVS.CO_CD = DEPT.CO_CD AND DIVS.DIV_CD = DEPT.DIV_CD WHERE dept.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND DIVS.DIV_CD = #{divCd} ORDER BY INSERT_DT ASC;
